track.name: Crawling Up A Hill
comments: Just love her music ..I have just bought her latest CD...its so good .
One of my favourites from her first album. Still hits the spot....:)
Well, I would do this with KM, crawl, but would rather ride a bicycle alongside her in Beijing. The  8,999,998 others need not accompany us :)
@lkredhat  - Katie doesn't sing pop music. Her music is best described as Jazz, blues, acoustic...
This song is constantly played in Matalan. I fucking despise it.
I was lost in Birmingham looking for a bus met a girl she sings, but was fron London see you around ...
This girl is truly wonderful, with such sweet voice
Not usually a pop music fan but she is an excellent song stylist
